hasAttributes.name: department
hasAttributes.description: The department the person is part of (for example, accounting).

hasAttributes.name: firstName
hasAttributes.description: The first (given) name of the person.

hasAttributes.name: lastName
hasAttributes.description: The last (family) name of the person.

hasAttributes.name: roleResponsibility
hasAttributes.description: The person’s functional role or primary responsibility (for example, accounts payable).

hasAttributes.name: title
hasAttributes.description: The title of the person (for example, accounting manager).

hasAttributes.name: userActiveModifiedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of user activation or termination.

hasAttributes.name: userActiveStatus
hasAttributes.description: The status of users (for identification of transactions by inactive users). The value of this field should be either “Active” or “Inactive” for flat file data; for XBRL GL, this is a Boolean, in which active is “true” and inactive is “false.”

hasAttributes.name: userId
hasAttributes.description: A unique identifier of individuals entering transactions into the ERP system. This field is used to join information in this table to other tables based on the fields Entered_By, Last_Modified_By, and Approved_By.
